title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Improving Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills Through Sequential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify explicit patterns (logical sequences) in given number sequences with over 85% accuracy within three attempts
Learners can efficiently perform sequence input tasks through implicit motor optimization (20% improvement in touchscreen input speed) after three days of learning
Learners can creatively construct compound sequences of five or more levels and explain their patterns in project evaluations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
